thread.title: Bob Baker
thread.title_full: Wilson Amplifiers reviewed by Bob Baker

author: Bob Baker
title: Bob Baker
text: Although I live in a high density cell phone area I got this for the occasions when I travel to fringe areas. Recently I traveled to my most frequent fringe area and was delighted to find that now I had 5 bars only to find out later that the cell provider had installed a tower locally. Otherwise to date I have seen little difference. While my 'testing' is not particularly scientific I did expect to see an increase in signal when my phone reads 2-3 bars out of the cradle and I put it into the cradle, That seldom happens. Otherwise I have no complaints and I actually like the cradle.
